Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device that uses string to connect two students, representing a form of communication over a distance.
The student can show that the string telephone allows sound to travel between the two students when they are far apart.
The student can include labels or symbols in the drawing to indicate that the device uses sound to communicate, not light.
The student can depict the materials used (cups and string) to build the device, demonstrating their use of provided materials.
The student can represent how this communication device helps people convey messages over a distance.
